Jacquielynn Floyd says Dwaine Caraway should have looked a little harder for candidates: And some maintain that Michael Vick , who lost his personal fortune and did prison time before being readmitted to the NFL, has more than paid his debt. They believe Michael Vick has asked for, and earned, forgiveness. But that doesn't tell the whole story. Dwaine Caraway didn't just offer Michael Vick Dallas' "forgiveness." Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.
